nodes.text: Creethe was an Abyssin smuggler. Alongside Lyo and a third smuggler, Creethe smuggled illegal nerve disruptors to Asusto to wait for their buyer. When the Jedi Lene Kostana, Sifo-Dyas, and Dooku went on a mission to Asusto, they encountered the Abyssin smugglers. Blinded by anger, Dooku killed the smugglers and destroyed their cargo.
Creethe first appeared in the audiobook Dooku: Jedi Lost, written by Cavan Scott and published in 2019. While not named in the audiobook, Creethe's name was given in the script.
